function.description: Calculate the area of various shapes given their dimensions.
function.name: calculate_area_of_shapes

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the shape (e.g., radius for circle, length & width for rectangle).

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its three sides using Heron's formula.
function.name: calculate_triangle_area

function.description: Calculate the surface area and volume of a cone based on its base radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_and_volume_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its vertices using the determinant formula.
function.name: calculate_area_of_triangle_from_vertices

vertex_a.description: Coordinates of vertex A as a tuple (x, y).

vertex_b.description: Coordinates of vertex B as a tuple (x, y).

vertex_c.description: Coordinates of vertex C as a tuple (x, y).

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cylinder given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cylinder

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cylinder.

function.description: Calculate the visible area of the circle above the x-axis given its diameter.
function.name: calculate_visible_part_of_circle

function.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.
function.name: calculate_area_of_circle

function.description: Calculate the surface area and volume of a cone based on its base radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_and_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The base radius of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
function.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

function.description: Calculate the volume of a right circular cone given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a cube given its edge length.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of an edge of the cube.

function.description: Calculate the surface area of a right circular cone given its radius and height.
function.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.

function.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
function.name: calculate_volume_of_sphere
